events.description: The S&P/ASX 200 dropped 2% to close at 8,708 on Friday, reaching a one-month low.
The Reserve Bank of Australia cut interest rates in February.

events.event_name: Rio Tinto and Glencore Merger Termination
events.description: Merger talks between Rio Tinto and Glencore ended after failing to agree on valuation.

facts.fact_text: The S&P/ASX 200 index closed at 8,708 on Friday, a 2% drop.

evidences.evidence_text: The S&P/ASX 200 dropped 2% to close at 8,708 on Friday

facts.fact_text: Australian technology stocks fell 3.4% to a more than two-year low.

evidences.evidence_text: Local technology stocks tumbled 3.4% to a more than two-year low

facts.fact_text: BHP and Fortescue shares declined by 3.1% and 1.2% respectively.

evidences.evidence_text: Heavyweight miners BHP and Fortescue declined 3.1% and 1.2%, respectively.

claims.claim_text: The global stock market rout was driven by concerns over heavy AI-related spending.

evidences.evidence_text: global stock market rout driven by concerns over heavy AI-related spending

claims.claim_text: The Reserve Bank of Australia signalled further rate easing this year.
claims.author: Reserve Bank of Australia

claims.claim_text: Local tech stocks were weighed down by capital expenditure plans from US tech giants.

evidences.evidence_text: weighed down by hefty capital expenditure plans from US tech giants

evidence.evidence_text: global stock market rout driven by concerns over heavy AI-related spending
the Reserve Bank of Australia cut rates in February and signalled further easing this year
weighed down by hefty capital expenditure plans from US tech giants
dragging the broader mining sector down 2.7% amid ongoing weakness in base metals
